Reviews.Title: Video Secu Mini Mics
Reviews.Author: Rick
Reviews.Content: Awesome describes how easily these install and how well they sound. Drill a 19/64 hole in the side of your garage and shove this mic through the hole and your able to hear any and all sounds around the garage or home(be sure to seal around hole with silicone). They are even better when you shove them through the camera wiring hole because they still work great and you can't tell they are there

Reviews.Title: Problem with auto amp in noise
Reviews.Author: BB Indiana
Reviews.Content: Using this on a VideoSecu camera that DOES (already) have a microphone but it's located in a bad spot the way I have it mounted (to the rear). I purchased this item and just strapped it to the camera with a cable tie with no problem. The hookup was no problem (5 min) and you just don't use the audio cable from the camera.The problem is noise... The amp is very sensitive and had an automatic level adjusting control. At first it was great and I heard things I never did before using the original camera mic THEN the neighbors outdoor air conditioner kicked on. I hear the air conditioner kicking on all the time with the original camera mic BUT with this this unit it just shut down and NOTHING was heard, not even the air conditioner.  I brought it inside and tried it with same camera power source and it worked great, very sensitive.  There is no way to control or set the 'auto level' and it shuts down when it shouldn't. It will 'probably work for Winter (when it's quiet) and in the mean time I may try inserting it into a tube and make a quasi-shotgun mic or some sound deadening material.Overall, good idea, simple setup, uses camera power, but may have problems in noisy environments.UPDATE: It's nowcCool enough air conditioner is not needed so I tried the amp again and slid it next to the camera. Wow, Without the noisy air conditiong (3 feet away) this thing is GREAT. I hear a lot more than with the mic on the camera.Quite happy...

Reviews.Title: please read "PREAMPED" AMPLIFIED
Reviews.Author: I. GLENN
Reviews.Content: This mic works as it should, The listing states clearly it is Preamped. The microhone is equiped with a amplification sound circuit. Mostly used for applications where farther range of distance listening is preferred. It can be pigtailed with longer AV cables; closer to where the action is, and away from the camera, and other metals that could cause interference if you are inexperienced in using it.

Reviews.Title: The highest quality of a sound. For this money I assumed will be worse.
Reviews.Author: Anfas
Reviews.Content: I ordered to the system of video surveillance. Didn't expect that the sound will be such high quality. I have 5 video cameras in a trading room and I bought 4 microphones to them. While established one of them to try. It seems to me it suffices on all room. It is audible the most low sound. Each word is very accurate. Very silent and imperceptible background noise. I am surprised and didn't expect such good sound. A subject by sight very strong and accurate. I urgently recommend.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Preamp Microphone w/ GREAT SOUND!
Reviews.Author: Smedsters
Reviews.Content: I have purchased 8 of these Excellent microphones for my CCTV system and have absolutely no complaints about them!  I have been VERY impressed by the great clarity and range of sound that is able to be picked-up.  I would absolutely recommend these for anyone with a CCTV system that desires sound and a very reasonable cost!

Reviews.Title: Works just as i expected and surpass myy expectations!!
Reviews.Author: John P. Barajas
Reviews.Content: Have it outside in the cold against a wall in my apts. and it works great with sound!  I even duck taped it a bit for the rain and it has rained like crazy and winds were horrible and it still functions and sounds clear!

Reviews.Title: Excellent Mic
Reviews.Author: techhead2k
Reviews.Content: I bought this microphone to use with my Q-See DVR security system as the cameras that came with the DVR do not have sound. I zip tied this to one of the cameras in the front of my house and it attaches to the cameras power connector with a pass through connector. I did need to wire that camera with a cable that carries video, sound, and power. The Q-See cable only carries video and power. No big deal as the cable I needed is available on Amazon and is cheap. This mic is really sensitive. I can hear everything in the immediate area clear as a bell. It picks up sound 50 feet away clearly. It also appears to be weather proof as I am using it outdoors with no problem. It also came with a sticker to warn people they are being recorded. Great product at a great price.

Reviews.Title: great product
Reviews.Author: RT
Reviews.Content: Worked as adverticed. Added it to my cctv and I am able to monitor video and sound remotely from work. It even picks up sounds from far away! I would recommend. Was shipped and received very fast!

Reviews.Title: Very Easy Hookup, Great Sound as Advertised
Reviews.Author: Nikola Tesla "Free Energy"
Reviews.Content: Hooks right inline with your existing 12v security camera, came quickly, hookup diagram available upon request from seller. I can hear clearly with no buzzing or humming, bugs, birds, planes, etc . . .awesome! Definitly a good buy if your looking for a add on microphone, highly recommended.

Reviews.Title: These are GREAT!!!
Reviews.Author: Just Me
Reviews.Content: Bought these to hook to my security cameras so I can have sound along with video monitoring. The small, super-sensitive microphones are well worth the price! When I turn up the volume on my camera monitor, I can hear what people are saying across the street from my house while they are talking at normal volume!

Reviews.Title: Exelent Mic
Reviews.Author: George
Reviews.Content: This microphone is an omnidirectional microphone (picks up sounds from any direction 360 degrees), it is very sensitive and amplified.The only problem you are going to have is "wind noise" when the wind hits the microphone (like when you speak too close to a microphone). To prevent that, I made a wind screen. I enclosed the microphone in a piece of foam  1"x1"x1", I opened a round hole in one of the sides (not going thru) of less than the diameter of the microphone and covered it with the black cloth found in speakers glued to the square foam using BARGE contact cement, inserted the microphone in the hole and it is done. My microphone is hiding in the soffit of the roof, right where the roof vent is and is pointing down- forward. I can hear and record all sounds in my DVR. Good luck.

Reviews.Title: Great value
Reviews.Author: mekeug
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these to use with our existing video cameras that we use as baby monitors in the house.  The quality of the sound is great and they are very sensitive and can pick up noises from down the hall.  The included rca and power connectors made it easy to connect to the existing cable for the camera.  Great price for a great product.

Reviews.Title: Awesome little mic
Reviews.Author: Terry
Reviews.Content: I was looking for a reasonably price mic to use. This little item is quite inexpensive considering that you can easily spend $50 for a professional mic. Plugging it into my video camera, it sounded great. Just the right volume. Not too loud or soft.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic for the money
Reviews.Author: mario
Reviews.Content: After extensive research, reading reviews, I thought I'd take the plunge despite negative reviews. This mic is fantastic. The sound quality is MUCH higher than my old ones.I'm extremely satisfied with the purchase.

Reviews.Title: Incredibly clear pure sound
Reviews.Author: Douglas
Reviews.Content: Bought this mic on recommendations from Amazon. I have used it in outside field conditions and inside. This mic works well in both locations. It provides clear, static free sound. Not to mention the great price!

Reviews.Title: Is this working correctly?
Reviews.Author: Siafu
Reviews.Content: // To view this video download Flash Player (version 9.0.115 or higher)'); } } catch(err) { fp_resizePlayerSpace('cv_mo3QM6DK1ZCLPGX', 0, 0); } return false; } function _cv_mo3QM6DK1ZCLPGXloadSwf(movieID, playerVersion) { var swfLocation = "http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/am3/20120510035744301/AMPlayer._V148501545_.swf"; } cv_mo3QM6DK1ZCLPGXpreplay.onmouseout = function() { cv_mo3QM6DK1ZCLPGXpreplay.src = "http://ecx.images-amazon.com/images/I/91HBQmmiXFS._SX320_PHcustomer-video-vignette_PIvideo-reviews-bottom,BottomLeft,0,43_OU01_PIcustomer-video-play,BottomLeft,130,-12_CR0,0,0,0_.png"; } var node = cv_mo3QM6DK1ZCLPGXpreplay.parentNode; var cv_mo3QM6DK1ZCLPGXcurrentClick = node.onclick; node.onclick = function () { var head = document.getElementsByTagName("head"); if (head[0]) { var logTag = document.createElement('script'); logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo3QM6DK1ZCLPGXcurrentClick) { return cv_mo3QM6DK1ZCLPGXcurrentClick(); } } } Length:: 0:16 MinsOrdered this mike based on reviews here. Got the mike, came with no instructions, but easy to hook up.The problem is (potential problem) there is a lot of noise, like some sort of interference. So loud that you can't monitor this for extended periods of time, almost unusable.I contacted Amazon in an effort to try to get the information for the seller or the manufacturer of this mic, but that was a challenge in it;s self dealing with so called costumer service Amazon has lately.Anyhow, I managed to get the info on my own about the seller, sent them several emails with sample file of what the mic sounds like, but no answer. See video.Obviously they have no clue or don't want to deal with this.So is this a good mic, probably not, unless you like a lot of white noise with your audio!!Basically if you get this and you have problems, don't expect any help, either from Amazon or the actual seller.UPDATE July 25 2012.Now nothjing is heard, it died. Crappy product and even more, crappy service, avoid this seller.

Reviews.Title: Excessive background noise
Reviews.Author: BlueMoon
Reviews.Content: I am not sure how this product gets those five-star reviews but my personal experience with the product was very disappointing. Though the items arrived promptly, the quality of the product was very poor. I hooked it up with the existing security system but the annoying beats and noises buried any audible signals, making this product to be a complete waste of money.

Reviews.Title: Very sensitive
Reviews.Author: Chris H
Reviews.Content: Most surveillance systems have the ability to record audio, but the cameras don't include microphones. So this is a very inexpensive addition that I highly recommend. The mic is easy to install and very sensitive. A MUST for your front door camera.

Reviews.Title: Good microphone
Reviews.Author: Marc Gothison
Reviews.Content: We purchased two of these microphones to complement a couple of VideoSecu cameras.  They seem sensitive enough to even low conversations out to five meters, and if installed properly, are not overwhelmed by excessive wind.They were completely compatible with the cameras and extension cables we used, but connector wires could have been a bit longer to ease installation.  Still, I'd probably purchase another one if I expand our home system.

Reviews.Title: Works, nothing fancy
Reviews.Author: J. Beams "JB"
Reviews.Content: Sensitive enough to use in monitoring my son's crib in the evening.  It picks up some 60Hz hum, but it's not overpowering and actual noises in the room are picked up well.  Assembly is simply a length of wire with a small PCB and microphone at the end, contained in shrink tubing.  Due to the exposed microphone type I don't believe it is waterproof and is probably not suitable for outdoor use, though it probably wouldn't be hard to devise a way to protect the microphone and remedy this.

Reviews.Title: Mike with pream arrived on time yesterday
Reviews.Author: robert yount
Reviews.Content: good quality, I can't wait to install it in my protoype.I am going to prchase more of there mikes.

Reviews.Title: good microphone
Reviews.Author: James M.
Reviews.Content: it works ok. my only complaint is once its all hooked up and running I hear a constant buzz/hum/whistle. I don't know if it's the microphone or something else causing it. I tried moving wires and a new power source but it is still there. I'm pretty sure it's an electrical problem somewhere but I can't seem to pin point it. probably not the microphones fault anyway.

Reviews.Title: works grate!!
Reviews.Author: California
Reviews.Content: very good mic, works grate! had bought it to capture load parties that were going on and has to prove the sound with a time stamp on my DVR and it works grate!

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work on my DVR system!
Reviews.Author: Eric
Reviews.Content: This microphone doesn't work on my Zmodo 16 Channel DVR system in any way! No matter how i hooked it up, i can't pick up or get any sounds!! Maybe it's not compatible with my system?

Reviews.Title: it is ok
Reviews.Author: donellyrodas
Reviews.Content: the VideoSecu High Sensitive Preamp Mini Audio Pickup Tiny Spy Microphone, i dont buy a cables but the instalation is very easy, the sound is good..

Reviews.Title: this mic works great..... and the power bypass saves the need for a power supply hogging up a outlet.
Reviews.Author: Michael Naughton
Reviews.Content: Even if your cctv camera has its own mic just bypass it with this and put it as far to either side or above?below as you can to avoid interference . it will pick up sound 100' away but some sounds up close will not come through which is good because it would distort.definetly worth the money just buy this model and not the other one w/o the power bypass its a .75cent difference and why not potentially avoid needing to buy or find a power supply.

Reviews.Title: sweet deal and cheap
Reviews.Author: thomas spears
Reviews.Content: I choose this because I wanted sound to my camera I odered one to see how it does well I went and got three more they are great you cant even tell they are there sweet because its amazing what people say behind your back then when you tell them what they said word for word there faces are amazing

Reviews.Title: it does not work
Reviews.Author: the note
Reviews.Content: Did not work for me if you would accept it i would like to return and buy the better one.

Reviews.Title: Sensitive microphone
Reviews.Author: Lawrence Turner
Reviews.Content: Does exactly what it's supposed to do.Will be ordering more very soon.I am serious about my security and this fills the gaps that my cameras don't.

Reviews.Title: So-so...
Reviews.Author: Woodlandsman "Woodlandsman"
Reviews.Content: None of these are very good. Sound recording and reproduction, however, is an art, not a science. If you want to, try these out. Don't expect much - you won't get much.

Reviews.Title: Good as NSA gear
Reviews.Author: Cuffy
Reviews.Content: For a small microphone with a pinhole to pick-up sound through, I was as amazed as others who bought this were at how sensitive the mike is and the quality of sound it records even at respectable distances.  Where ours is mounted at the main door it records crystal-clear voice and other useful ambient noise.  It even comes with the requisite warning decal warning of audio monitoring on-premise.

Reviews.Title: Absolutely Great Mic!
Reviews.Author: Miraflor Ellis
Reviews.Content: Used these in a commercial security setting. Could actually hear the night janitors mop on the floor. Will buy more of these in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Dennis McLume
Reviews.Content: Gets the job done, very sensitive microphone, easy to set up & mount, not noticeable (of course, based on how you mount it, but it is very small). Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: I never used it
Reviews.Author: RobSegura82
Reviews.Content: I bought this and came to find out it was the wrong size for my security system. I cant give it a negative rating because I never got to see if it worked.

Reviews.Title: Works great good sound quality & even comes with a nice sticker so you can use it legally.
Reviews.Author: Cyberlinxz
Reviews.Content: Works great good sound quality & even comes with a nice sticker so you can use it legally.will be getting 4 more!

Reviews.Title: i gave a bad review at first  i now give a great review
Reviews.Author: kelly
Reviews.Content: i ordered 8 cables. 1 was bad this is the first time i have ordered on amazon. i wasn't sure how to get a remody. i left a bad post. within 2 days i got taken care of. i give this person 10 stars for taking care of me with out a hassle.  i have other houses and will bye from them again. thank you for keeping your word. kelly

Reviews.Title: very useful
Reviews.Author: mac
Reviews.Content: I've been using 4 of this mini audio pick-up continuously indoors for more than a year. I coupled this to the cctv camera 12VDC power supply. Unfortunately I installed one near my wall clock(about 2ft away). It is so sensitive that the annoying tik-tak noise of the wall clock keeps on ringing my ears every time I select that channel from the DVR monitor, so I decided to relocate the clock. Even the barking of my dogs outside can be heard as well as other background noise. I tried installing one outdoors and it is working fine however the noise is terrible during windy days so I decided to keep it indoors.This is very helpful in monitoring what's going on at home when Im at work.I can see my cctv and hear the audio using online monitoring. I can hear also if my wife is cursing me lol...for the price I think I get my money's worth. This could have been better if there is noise cancelling filter, but for a mini mic to have that I think I will have to pay much more. I'm satisfied with the performance so far and would recommend this to others.

Reviews.Title: Installed in CCTV system
Reviews.Author: Allison J. Parmalee
Reviews.Content: These were installed in concert with some CCTV cameras which do not have audio.  They work well. Will consider more in future.

Reviews.Title: Small and effective hiddem MIC
Reviews.Author: ZechariahB
Reviews.Content: MICs are used for all sorts of things, and in the application of this order it was used for audio recording on a surveillance system.  The audio is clear  and the plugs for connection are well made.  No problems thus far.  Thanks Amazon and VideoSecu.

Reviews.Title: Works perfectly.  Will purchase again
Reviews.Author: LowTek
Reviews.Content: This mic was plug and play.  I used these to add audio to a cheap CCTV system.  The audio is crystal clear.

Reviews.Title: exactly what i needed
Reviews.Author: JLR
Reviews.Content: To capture audio on my 500gb DVR surveillance system. Product was not difficult at all to install and pics up audio quite well.

Reviews.Title: WORKS FINE
Reviews.Author: rick land
Reviews.Content: BUT ENGINEERS NEED TO MAKE AN AMPLIFIERHAVE TO USE WITH TV TO HEAR SOUNDI MIGHT PURCHASE AGAIN BUT WOULD LIKE ONE THAT HAS AMPLIFIER

Reviews.Title: doesn't work
Reviews.Author: Steve Henry
Reviews.Content: I connected this mic to power and video audio box that works with other mic and I get nothing. thanks

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu High Sensitive Preamp Mini Audio Pickup Tiny Microphone
Reviews.Author: walter loggins
Reviews.Content: This is a great microphone.  It pick up a car door being closed (when closed without slamming) over two hundred feet. I turn my volume control really low and still get all the outside noise (as in someone talking in my street).

Reviews.Title: Can you hear me?
Reviews.Author: Robert D. Borum
Reviews.Content: After hooding up this mic, I was able to place it under the hood of my camera I could hear voices through out the house. Most clear within 50Feet

Reviews.Title: super high gain
Reviews.Author: Scott
Reviews.Content: Works well. High distortion WILL happen if the the people are close by. Not the fault of the mic. Use an audio pad of 15-30db in the line before your DVR audio input in that case, problem solved.

Reviews.Title: Sensitive Tiny Microphone pickup
Reviews.Author: Best Value
Reviews.Content: Must say a great product buy this more expensive one. it seems to pickup better and what the heck. it only $2.00 more. has a verity of ends for 12vdc hookup.use a monitor and your up and running in 6 minutes.

Reviews.Title: it is ok
Reviews.Author: BACbKA nynKuH
Reviews.Content: you can buy it from PRC online stores much cheaper but it would risk delays and miscommunication with sellers. If use outdoor keep in mind it will corrode in no time especially near a beach line.

Reviews.Title: microphone
Reviews.Author: ribbons
Reviews.Content: This microphone picks up well on the audio camera I have it attached to.  We need a microphone to know when we have deliveries or guests in our driveway since we cannot see or hear them otherwise.  It works well the purpose intended

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: Kevin S
Reviews.Content: Great Microphone for your CCTV Cameras. If you don't already have one. Works great outside. I have a camera out back of the house to keep an eye on my pups to see them play now and then I'm way back in my room. Well it is great. My dogs at times are at least a 100 or so feet away from the Camera and Microphone  when any one of them them does that sweet little lite sound of a frustrated growl at all sorts of things every once in a while before the load bark, I hear them. Lite little sounds of birds in the background over a hundred yards away I swear, hear that too. Whispers of people I can hear over a 100 feet. Great Item.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu High Sensitive Preamp Mini Audio Pickup.
Reviews.Author: Clayton E. Lake
Reviews.Content: The VideoSecu High Sensitive Preamp Mini Audio Pickup is eays to install and works fine for adding sound to a security camera that does not have audio.  This is my second one to purchase.

Reviews.Title: A must have for deaf camera
Reviews.Author: Lagenorhincus
Reviews.Content: After setting up my home surveillance system, I realized it would great to have some audio from specific cameras,entrance gate for instance. Well, this is the solution! Keep in mind that you might need another type of cable thanthe one that usually comes with your system (BNC + RCA), this kind: http://www.amazon.com/gp/product/B004HY5ZQE/ref=cm_cr_ryp_prd_ttl_sol_5Works like a charm! Excellent price!

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu High Sensitive Preamp
Reviews.Author: Gene
Reviews.Content: This little Mic is unreal!!  Holy Mackeral !!  I connected this thing to my surround sound system. You would not believe the amplification.  I put the mic under my window. I could hear birds, airplanes flying over head. I could hear people talking across the street, very, very clear...  I could turn my surround sound only half way because of feed back. I,m sure if I move the mic about 100 foot from the Amplifier it will be loud and clear. If your looking for a really super Mic. Look no further. This is the one!!!!!

Reviews.Title: Good sound & sensitivity but no instructions
Reviews.Author: A1 Computer Consulting "a1computerconsulting.com"
Reviews.Content: It didn't come with any instructions or specifications!  So my electrical contractor had to guess how to connect it & what voltage it used.  But It worked & has good quality sound & is fairly sensitive.  So I guess it was connected right.

Reviews.Title: BETTER THAN EXPECTED
Reviews.Author: JEREMY MCCELLON
Reviews.Content: VIDEO SECU DID ALL THAT WAS PROMISED AND DID IT FASTER THAN WAS EVEN EXPECTED. I WOULD RECOMEND THEM TO EVERYONE  LOOKING FOR SURVEILANCE EQUIPMENT OR ACCESORIES.

Reviews.Title: What an amazing device
Reviews.Author: Larry Milburn
Reviews.Content: Preamplified Microphone: this miniature device out preformed what I was expecting. The clarity certainly surprised me, then the sensitivity was also great.

Reviews.Title: Good sound
Reviews.Author: Aris Abeleda
Reviews.Content: This was paired with a Vonnic security camera and hooked to a Q-See DVR.  The audio is excellent on my setup.  I think the "static" that some reviewers hear may be wind noise.  This is a very sensitive microphone which hears and amplifies sound from all over including ambient sounds like the wind.

Reviews.Title: Mini Audio Pickup
Reviews.Author: Black Eyes "Frosed"
Reviews.Content: I have not installed this yet, but I did connect it for a test.It works better than I expected.Thanks

Reviews.Title: Works
Reviews.Author: CiderJack "Shiny, lets be bad guys!"
Reviews.Content: Works but not real well. I am getting a lot of background noise even with the gain turned all the way down. Voices are barely understandable and occasionally not. Might have to do some more checking around before getting any more mics.

Reviews.Title: Better than expected is an understatment
Reviews.Author: BillyETX
Reviews.Content: The Power pass-through is an awesome benefit to just add this to any camera. The Microphone is extremely sensitive and small, I tucked this inside the Vinyl siding oh my home and just left the microphone sticking out (you'll never notice it) but I can hear conversations 100 feet away!I have an indoor dome camera with a built in microphone and it is terrible. from now on, I will only purchase this type of microphone.

Reviews.Title: Just what we needed
Reviews.Author: The customer is right!
Reviews.Content: I installed one of those cheap Lorex security camera systems with a DVR at our business. I needed to be able to see what was going on when my wife and I aren't in to make sure equipment was being cleaned properly etc. It has helped us know what we need to train on quite a bit! I just added two of these microphone setups and that's been a great boost too! Now I know how the staff answers the phone, and etc. I also know if a customer is being loud, or anything else that's going on. Too bad the Lorex mobile software doesn't do audio to the cell phone software... The mic is great! Has a bit of a hiss, but that's because when there's no sound to amplify it seems to go full volume, then it adjusts and the hiss goes away when someone talks etc. Love it.

Reviews.Title: does not connect to this product
Reviews.Author: ada santiago
Reviews.Content: this thing was useless, it was not compatible...I am very upset and do not think I will be buying anything over 20 bucks from Amazon.com again

Reviews.Title: Listen to the outside world
Reviews.Author: James L Smith
Reviews.Content: I beefed up the insulation on my home and discovered that I could hear very little from the outside. I sit at my computer almost all day. I wired two of these up to a pair of PC speakers with amplifiers. I can now hear my front yard in stereo. I patched in to the audio on my computer and I am recording what I hear 24/7. I have one mic that I wired to the back yard, so I can hear there too. The audio is excellent. Be prepared to hear wind noise on windy days. I used foam to mask some of the wind but I still live with some.

Reviews.Title: Best audio yet!
Reviews.Author: CamJam Cindy
Reviews.Content: I wished I had found this sooner! I have bought several various CCTV security camera's with audio built in over the past year as well as hooking them up to high quality video/audio cable and the sound was still terrible or barely audible. So while in hunt for yet another audio/video CCTV security camera, I found these on Amazon. I thought the price was great and much cheaper than buying another camera and took a chance and bought four of this item. This mic works fantastic and so easy to install! I used this item to by pass the built in audio on one of my camera's and what a HUGE difference it made! I also added this to a video camera that did not have audio and I am so very pleased! I wish I had found these long ago. These would have saved me lots of money spent on various audio video security camera's as well as the time and stress.

Reviews.Title: NOT worth it
Reviews.Author: John
Reviews.Content: I can not get anything from this microphone, unless spoken loudly 2 inchs from the mic, survalence audio is not even a option.

Reviews.Title: the only thing I hear is...
Reviews.Author: Dave the Pear
Reviews.Content: the only thing I hear is a loud hummmmm... as if it were poorly grounded. idk, maybe the camera it's hooked too is a piece of junk... meh.

Reviews.Title: Doesn't work
Reviews.Author: A Customer
Reviews.Content: Having a degree in electrical engineering, I'm somewhat certain of my opinoin that this thing doesn't work. To be "detailed and specific", It doesn't work no how, no way. I bought 2, and tried them on two systems with 2 different configurations.

Reviews.Title: Microphone
Reviews.Author: Iphone
Reviews.Content: Not working within 1 feet distance you have to speak right in to it front of your mouth so not to buy itThanks

Reviews.Title: Garbage
Reviews.Author: C. MURPHY
Reviews.Content: Its clear to me that Videosecu pays people to write perfect reviews.  This is the second product I have ordered from them, and this is the second product that will be sent back.  The sound quality was absolute garbage when compared to my other CCTV mics.  Lots of pops and clicks during recording, and the  range is 2-3 feet at best.  Do yourself a favor and buy another brand.
